snippet.title: Beneath Oresa - Exclusive Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Meet the boss! Take a brand new look at one of the bosses in the upcoming indie Beneath Oresa in this gameplay trailer.

Beneath Oresa, a fighting roguelike deckbuilder, takes you deep within the city to confront your foes. As a strategist, choose your cards, upgrades, and artifacts wisely, but as a fighter, turn their positioning to your advantage. Coming 2022 to Steam - bit.ly/OresaDemo

#IGN #IGNExpo #Gaming
